text: As more women share their stories of sexual assault amid the staggering number of accusations against producer Harvey Weinstein, actress Laura Dern realized that she had been justifying experiences she had as a teenager as “ the norm. ” Dern, 50, spoke with Ellen DeGeneres in an interview set to air Wednesday about being honored at ELLE magazine ’ s Women in Hollywood Awards Monday. At the event, women spoke about sexual abuse they ’ ve faced in their lives.
